goal.ch: “學習微分與積分的基本知識, 培養列式, 求解及解釋問題的應用能力“
goal.en: “Learning the basic knowledge of differentiation and integration for establishing the ability of formulating, solving and interpreting the results of problems involving applications“

outline.ch:
In this course, we will study the following topics:
1. Integration by Parts, Integration Using Tables of Intergals, Numerical Integration, Improper Integrals, and Volumes of Solids of Revolution
2. Calculus of Several Variables
3. Differential Equations
4. Probability and Calculus
5. Taylor Polynomials and Infinite Series
6. Trigonometric Functions
7. L‘Hopital‘s Rule
outline.en:
In this course, we will study the following topics:
1. Integration by Parts, Integration Using Tables of Intergals, Numerical Integration, Improper Integrals, and Volumes of Solids of Revolution
2. Calculus of Several Variables
3. Differential Equations
4. Probability and Calculus
5. Taylor Polynomials and Infinite Series
6. Trigonometric Functions
7. L‘Hopital‘s Rule

textbook.ch: Soon T. Tan, Applied Calculus for the Managerial, Life, and Social Sciences, 10th ed.
textbook.en: Soon T. Tan, Applied Calculus for the Managerial, Life, and Social Sciences, 10th ed.

gradMethod.ch:
小考 10％
作業 10％
會考四25％
會考五25％
會考六30％
Python作業5％
其他5％
gradMethod.en:
quizzes 10％
homeworks 10％
midterm Ⅳ 25％
midterm Ⅴ 25％
midterm Ⅵ 30％
Python homeworks 5％
others 5％

flexDiscription.ch: 第17、18週彈性教學規劃如下： 每位同學每學年，將執行微積分上機演習短期課程，共9小時及上、下學期Python自學課程與作業繳交(每學期3次，共6次)，合計9小時，總計18小時。成績評量方式如紙本授課計畫-配分標準所示。
flexDiscription.en: 第17、18週彈性教學規劃如下： 每位同學每學年，將執行微積分上機演習短期課程，共9小時及上、下學期Python自學課程與作業繳交(每學期3次，共6次)，合計9小時，總計18小時。成績評量方式如紙本授課計畫-配分標準所示。
